_header: A lords purpose and a ladys thought
_description: Proverbial couplet on the changeability of lord’s purpose and woman’s thought — one couplet

GULHun230.Transcription:
A lordis purpos and a ladyis thoghttIn a yer schonyth full
                    offtt
GULHun230.Note:
Added to end flyleaf by hand of s. xvi by same hand as wrote couplets
                    and ‘quod Wyllughby’ on f. 147 and ‘quod Rychard
                    Wylloughbe’ after 190 on f.
                    148.
